properties.entry: SELECT DISTINCT RC.CROP_ID , CR.CROP_NAME , RC.CROP_AMOUNT FROM CROP CR, FARM_CROP FC, RETAIN_CROP RC WHERE CR.CROP_ID = RC.CROP_ID AND FC.USER_NO = RC.USER_NO AND FC.USER_NO = '1' AND RC.CROP_ID > 4 ORDER BY CROP_ID
UPDATE RETAIN_CROP SET CROP_AMOUNT = CROP_AMOUNT - 1 WHERE CROP_ID = ?
SELECT FARM_EXP FROM USER_INFO where USER_NO = ?
DELETE FROM FARM_CROP where USER_NO = 1 AND FARM_LIST = ?
UPDATE RETAIN_CROP SET CROP_AMOUNT = CROP_AMOUNT +1 WHERE CROP_ID = ? AND USER_NO = 1
SELECT RC.CROP_ID , RC.CROP_AMOUNT FROM RETAIN_CROP RC WHERE RC.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY CROP_ID
